snippet.title: PowerWash Simulator Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
PowerWash Simulator is now available on Steam Early Access! Buy now: https://bit.ly/PlayPWS for ultimate spray satisfaction! Watch our new epic trailer and become the power washing hero you were always meant to be!

#PowerWashSimulator #Powerwashing #IndieGame #IndieDev

Let the soothing sounds of high-pressure water wash away your worries. Fire up your powerwasher and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find. Release the Pressure, with PowerWash Simulator.

For more pressure washing goodness subscribe to our channel!
Follow our Twitter for daily satisfying content: https://bit.ly/TwitterPWS
Join our Discord to join the conversation: https://discord.gg/powerwashsimulator
Follow us on TikTok for quick spray socials: https://bit.ly/PWSTikTok

We are FuturLab and can't wait for your to play our power washing game!
